item.title: NpcDialogues thing [317] **HELP
item.dc:creator: @Skillapwnz Skillapwnz
item.description:
@Skillapwnz wrote:

Hey i have a npc dialogues list ( i know how to code a npc dialogue) but this is like for their expression on their face when their talking, like they are mad so the npc is making a mad talking way like here’s part of the list i have

9824 = Shaking head wierdly
9825 = Shaking head wierdly
9826 = Shaking head wierdly
9827 = Glances up, looks down
9828 = Glances up, looks down
9829 = Glances up, talks, looks down
9830 = Talking while looking directionaly up

if i wanted to put those codes, what part of the code would i add it too? here’s the npc dialogue that i wanna change one of the expressions in.

if(NPCID == 1375) {
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(1375), 4884);
sendFrame126(“Welcome to the MyServers train area!”, 4885);
sendFrame126(“Click here to continue.”, 4886);
sendFrame75(1375, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
}
